GSD.description:
USB: core: Prevent nested device-reset calls

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit abe3cfb7a7c8e907b312c7dbd7bf4d142b745aa8. For more details please see the references link.
